Name: The City of Time
About the game: The little girl comes to the City of Time, this place has the magic of making time back, you can use the magic of time backward to make time interlaced to help the little girl through difficulties. Your actions mean the route when the time goes backwards. Once make mistakes, they will be irreversible, you need to use your brain to make full use of the time back and the appropriate course of action to pass the level successfully Game features: 1. Control the progress and reverse flow of time to find a suitable opportunity to cross the level 2. It is highly recommended to players who like puzzle and brain-burning games. Every route you pass determines whether you can pass the level Hello, this is my independent game, the story tells about a little girl who comes to the City of Time, and use the backward and the interlacement of time toÂ  pull through one after another difficulties. Everyone is welcome to give valuable comments and own ideas on my game. You can contact me in the menu of the game. I hope everyone can enjoy my game, thank you.
